doc:
Fred Crane (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fred_Crane_(actor) 0 Fred Crane, Herman Frederick Crane, (March 22, 1918 – August 21, 2008) was an American film and television actor and radio announcer. He is probably best known for his role as Brent Tarleton in the 1939 film, Gone with the Wind, speaking the opening lines in the movie during the opening scene with Scarlett O'Hara (Vivien Leigh) and Stuart Tarleton (George Reeves). Fred_Crane , Herman_Frederick_Crane , ( March_22_,_1918 – August_21_,_2008 ) was an_American_film_and_television_actor_and_radio_announcer .
